SINT_Prompt_Task.Objective: Conduct a comprehensive analysis of climate change effects on global agriculture, coastal communities, and biodiversity. Use the Debates (N=3) + Conflict (Step 3A) methodology with detailed expert positions, numerical ratings (1-10), cross-criticism, and iterative convergence.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Context: Climate change impact on global agriculture, coastal communities, and biodiversity. Key considerations include rising sea levels, changing precipitation patterns, temperature increases, and ecosystem disruption.

Consultant.Name: Environmental Scientist
Consultant.Focus: Climate science, ecosystem impacts, biodiversity loss assessment

Consultant.Name: Economist
Consultant.Focus: Economic impacts of climate change, cost-benefit analysis of adaptation measures

Consultant.Name: Policy Analyst
Consultant.Focus: Policy responses, international cooperation, regulatory frameworks

SINT_Prompt_Task.Methodology: Expert Debates (N=3) + Conflict (Step 3A) with detailed expert positions, numerical ratings (1-10), cross-criticism, and iterative convergence
SINT_Prompt_Task.Finalization_Protocol: All expert positions must include detailed arguments with concrete examples, data points, and numerical ratings. The process must include iterative rounds of criticism and synthesis with detailed cross-evaluation between experts. Output must include multiple rounds of criticism, iterative convergence, and comprehensive synthesis.
